Subclasses.name: Commander
Subclasses.description: Commanders are focused on supporting their allies through coordination and inspiration, shifting into formations and the battle shifts and changes

Subclasses.name: Path of Calamity
Subclasses.description: Let your fury simmer inside of you like a bubbling cauldera of a volcano, until you errupt

Subclasses.name: College of Myth
Subclasses.description: Bards of this college take the study of legends and tales to a new extreme, summining projections directly from the stories they tell

Subclasses.name: Way of The Spectre
Subclasses.description: Monks from this practice study the otherworldly abilities of ghosts and emulate them with their strange ki

Subclasses.name: College of The Jester
Subclasses.description: These bards know just how to get under the enemies' skin, drawing all attention towards themselves

Subclasses.name: Path of Madness
Subclasses.description: The chaotic visions trapped within your mind are suddenly set loose into the "real" world

Subclasses.name: The Construct
Subclasses.description: Beings of absolute law and order often seek mortals who can aid in their journey to rid the world of both chaos and free will itself

Subclasses.name: The Flesh
Subclasses.description: This warlock patron is an unknowable elder god of twisting flesh, and the gifts it gives to its warlocks focus entirely on the physical form, both their own and others

Subclasses.name: The Dark Merchant
Subclasses.description: Dark merchants treat their warlocks less like supplicants, and more like employes, expendable lives whos main value is to meet the bottom line

Subclasses.name: Way of The Battle Dancer
Subclasses.description: These monks are practiced in perfoming and maintaning an elaborate dance, which includes the elements of the battle they are currently in

Subclasses.name: The Dreamer
Subclasses.description: There are many great beings that walk the realms of the unconcious, and often they rival those from the far plane in their incomprehensability

Subclasses.name: Circle of Metal
Subclasses.description: Metal is usually avoided by druids, but druids in these circles seek out the strength and certainty they provide

Subclasses.name: Way of The Viper
Subclasses.description: Viper monks find that the best way to end a fight is quickly and suddely

Subclasses.name: Circle of Ooze
Subclasses.description: These druids find value in the shifting and consuming nature of acidic slimes, surviving in the darkest and dankest places in the world

Subclasses.name: Sniper
Subclasses.description: Snipers are focused on waiting paciently for the perfect opertunity to take their shot. Unlike other rogues who wish to zip around the battlefield, snipers choose to wage war from as far back as they can manage.
